question: Shagun' portal, which is in news recently, is associated to which field?
explanation: Union Human Resource Development Minister Ramesh Pokhriyal Nishank has recently launched a school education portal \'Shagun\', which links over 15 lakh schools across the country to provide all the information on school education. The schools have been geo-tagged and all the data provided by them can be accessed through this portal.  According to HRD officials, there would also be a third-party verification of the information provided by schools. Through this initiative, more than 2.3 lakh educational websites can be integrated.
